com.salimov.yurii.util.worktime

Class Time

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salimov.yurii.util.worktime.Time
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ITime

    public class Time
extends java.lang.Object
implements ITime
    The class implements a set of methods for working with time string in the format "00:00".
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yuriy Salimov (yuriy.alex.salimov@gmail.com)
    See Also:
    ITime

      • getCorrectTime

        public java.lang.String getCorrectTime()
        Returns correct time. Returns time in format "00:00". Returns "00:00" if method throws some exception.
        Specified by:
        getCorrectTime in interface ITime
        Returns:
        The correct time.

      • getHours

        public int getHours()
        Returns a correct hours of the time. If input time has than 0 hours, then returns 0 hours. If hours greater or equal 24 or hours less or equal then sets hours = 0. If input time has more than 60 minutes, then adds one hours.
        Specified by:
        getHours in interface ITime
        Returns:
        The value of a correct minutes.

      • getMinutes

        public int getMinutes()
        Returns a correct minutes of the time. If input time has than 0 minutes, then returns 0 minutes. If minutes greater 60 then returns minutes % 60.
        Specified by:
        getMinutes in interface ITime
        Returns:
        The value of a correct minutes.

      • isNotBlankTime

        Returns the value of input time is not blank.
        Specified by:

        Returns:
        true if the input time is not blank, false otherwise.
